textBeforeTable: web development video user experience software development social media operations entertainment engineering design community management California business development all employers See the complete Victorious profile Victorious - Victorious is a Santa Monica, CA based startup that is “motivated by the challenge of powering and uniting the world’s most creative communities.” Companies with Entry Level Jobs and Internships in Video You’ll need a bachelor’s degree for most of these positions, and some experience with a video camera certainly won’t hurt. If you’re looking to go into videography, you’ll need a portfolio of your best work. You can also work with a company that’s changing the way we consume media, such as Hulu or Netflix. Or you can work with a film or videography company. Videography Video advertising Video reviews Educational video Video sharing Video training Video is sneaking into more and more industries as more businesses embrace it.
